headline: Universal Health price target lowered to $251 from $275 at TD Cowen
summary: TD Cowen analyst Ryan Langston lowered the firm’s price target on Universal Health (UHS) to $251 from $275 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm said UHS is a best idea for 2025. The incoming administration and market sentiment add risk to the pick and acknowledge the potential for revisions to entitlement programs and other headwinds. headline: Invesco Comstock Fund Q3 2024 Commentary
summary: Invesco Comstock Fund underperformed the Russell 1000 Value Index. Real estate, utilities and industrials were performance leaders, while energy was the only negative sector for the quarter.
